abstract: Like Google and Facebook, Apple has been confronted with Germany’s privacy laws, among Europe’s stiffest.
snippet: Like Google and Facebook, Apple has been confronted with Germany’s privacy laws, among Europe’s stiffest.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  The justice minister of Germany expressed concern on Monday over Apple’s practice of compiling data on users of its new iPhone, making the company the latest technology giant to fall afoul of the country’s strict privacy laws.

headline.main: Germany Asks Apple About iPhone’s Data-Gathering
headline.print_headline: Germany Asks Apple About iPhone’s Data-Gathering
